A4.text: Strategy of Progress, a 1972 book by Ernst Basler, explained how the long-acknowledged sustainability concept of preserving forests for future wood production can be directly transferred to the broader importance of preserving environmental resources to sustain the world for future generations.

A5.text: The direct linking of sustainability and development in a contemporary sense can be traced to the early 1970s.
